meanings.definition: An additional layer of printing on top of an existing image.
meanings.sent1: The surprint added depth to the picture.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to include a surprint to enhance the colors.
meanings.sent3: The surprint made the image look like it was popping out of the paper!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a surprint on the otherwise plain canvas.
meanings.sent5: The surprint made the artwork come alive with vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: To print an additional layer on top of an existing image.
meanings.sent1: She will surprint the logo onto the t-shirt.
meanings.sent2: The printer can easily surprint more details if needed.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally surprinted the wrong color, creating a unique effect.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that day surprinted themselves in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully surprinted the final touches to complete the masterpiece.
